Posts.Content: Chi2013 wrote: I discovered a lump in my right breast almost 3 weeks ago and my ultrasound, after initial GYN appointment, is not scheduled for another week. The waiting is so difficult, especially with the lure of the internet right at your fingertips. I'm a 36 year old mom to a 9 month old and I feel so horrible that this is taking over me mentally. I should be focused on her and yet I keep thinking of the negative and how a diagnosis would affect our family. Any advice on how to get through the waiting? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tired of Waiting-Advice? Chi2013 Chi2013

Posts.Content: Aug 14, 2013 07:10AM Chi2013 wrote: Thanks for the tips and prayers. I've never had lumpy breasts before but I'm sure pregnancy/breastfeeding have a lot to do with change. This lump is hard which is scary. Trying to stay positive.
Posts.Title: Tired of Waiting-Advice? Chi2013 Chi2013
